html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-12342024-11-22ECCC
ActCanada Wildlife Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Wildlife Area Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the WILDLIFE AREA REGULATIONS in order to (1) remove three narrow parcels of roadside land currently found in Big Creek National Wildlife Area (Ontario); (2) replace the current boundary description of Big Glace Bay Lake NWA with a simplified description that includes the total area of the NWA and refers to a registered plan number deposited in the Land Registration Office for the County of Cape Breton; and (3) replace the current boundary description of the Jolicure Unit of Tintamarre NWA in Subitem 1(1) of Part II (New Brunswick) of Schedule I to the Regulations with a simplified description that includes the total area of the NWA and refers to a registered plan number deposited in the Westmorland County Registry Office.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0229 Publication Date: 2024-12-04
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the WILDLIFE AREA REGULATIONS in order to (1) remove three narrow parcels of roadside land currently found in Big Creek National Wildlife Area (Ontario); (2) replace the current boundary description of Big Glace Bay Lake NWA with a simplified description that includes the total area of the NWA and refers to a registered plan number deposited in the Land Registration Office for the County of Cape Breton; and (3) replace the current boundary description of the Jolicure Unit of Tintamarre NWA in Subitem 1(1) of Part II (New Brunswick) of Schedule I to the Regulations with a simplified description that includes the total area of the NWA and refers to a registered plan number deposited in the Westmorland County Registry Office.
